items.description: 2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle game developed by Gabriele Cirulli. Merge tiles with the same power of 2 to get the total sum. The goal is to keep merging tiles this way until you reach 2048!

items.title: Black
items.description: Black is another color-based puzzle game for you! Can you make the screen black in all 25 levels? Each level has its own logic. You can also get the FREE mobile version with 50 levels (including new levels that are more suitable for mobile play).

items.title: Blue
items.description: After Yellow,Red, andBlack, now you got Blue, another puzzle game for you! Can you make the screen blue in all 25 levels? Each level has its own challenge.

items.title: Chessformer
items.description: Chessformer is a challenging puzzle arcade game where your movements are confined to the chess piece you're given. Use your chess pieces' unique abilities to navigate through each stage and reach the king.

items.title: Green
items.description: Green is a challenging puzzle game made byBart Bonte. Like his previous games,blackandblue, you must turn the whole screen a single color by solving the puzzle. This time the color is green. Have fun!

items.title: Orange
items.description: Orange is a captivating puzzle game that challenges you to bring vibrant orange hues to every level. With 25 unique and thought-provoking puzzles, can you uncover the logic and master each stage to fill the screen with the mesmerizing color of orange? Test your problem-solving skills and immerse yourself in this colorful and addictive gameplay experience. Get ready to paint the world orange!

items.title: Pink (Bart Bonte)
items.description: Pink is another screen-filling puzzle game from Bart Bonte and the next episode aftergreenandblue. This time you need to make the screen pink in all 25 levels. Each level has its own logic.

items.title: Red
items.description: Red is a fun and exciting puzzle game – the browser version of this popular title is finally here so get ready for some fun! The aim of this game is simple – you must attempt to turn the whole screen red – this might sound easy but as you progress the challenges become increasingly difficult and you must really strain your mind to think of a solution.
